title: Every Special building (as defined in UDCPR-2020) shall be provided with Fire Towers having minimum 2 hours fire resistance, consisting of a fireman evacuation lift with a ventilated lobby as an integral part of fire escape staircase, preferably at landing level
clause_text: Every Special building (as defined in UDCPR-2020) shall be provided with Fire Towers having minimum 2 hours fire resistance, consisting of a fireman evacuation lift with a ventilated lobby as an integral part of fire escape staircase, preferably at landing level. Fire Tower may be provided as per sketches shown in the Annexure-C.
